stat Struct Reference
[Special Functions.]

#include <stat.h>

Detailed Description

File status structure.
Examples:

portdio/portdio.c.


Data Fields

short st_ino
 Block number.
u_char st_mode
 Mode flags.
u_short st_nlink
 Number of links.
u_long st_size
 Size.
time_t st_mtime
 Time of last modification.
